name: phpBB/RSS
short_description: phpBB/RSS - is a phpBB mod, based on phpBB 2.0.10 source, designed for exporting forum feeds to take advantage of native phpBB classes. No need in using plain'n'old mySQL - just use the power of phpBB/RSS instead.
